alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 30 at 2:05PM PST until December 02 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT PST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet, locally up to 4 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 to 65 mph. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada Counties...including Interstate 80 over Donner Pass and Highway 50 over Echo Summit. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to midnight PST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Heavy snow and gusty winds will bring reduced visibility with whiteout conditions at times, especially Thursday morning. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected between 4 AM and noon PST Thursday when up to 2 to 4 inches an hour of snow are possible. Travel impacts may linger overnight into early Friday morning. Additional heavy snow is possible Saturday afternoon into early Monday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
